title: Best of the Offseason
itunes:title: Best of the Offseason
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler, Colleen Wolfe & Gregg Rosenthal – are actually all on the beach celebrating the 4th of July. Check out some of the best moments so far this offseason including the heroes making amends with QB Derek Carr and the farewell to Producer Sydney.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
